name: DOUGLAS PRODUCTS
description: Provides services for global production agriculture and structural pest control markets.
sampleDescriptions: Obtain support from USDA-APHIS for treatment schedules for export of U.S. logs using the fumigant sulfuryl fluoride (trade name ProFume).
Obtain support from USDA-APHIS for treatment schedules for export of U.S. logs involving the fumigant sulfuryl fluoride (trade name ProFume).
Advocate through the regulatory process for the use of the fumigant sulfuryl fluoride on U.S. logs and wood products treated for export purposes.
